  • Method Details

    • prettyPrint

      public static void prettyPrint(Writer out, SearchHelper sh, int start, long end) throws HistoryException, IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Prints out results in html form. The following search helper fields are required to be properly initialized:
      • SearchHelper.dataRoot
      • SearchHelper.contextPath
      • SearchHelper.searcher
      • SearchHelper.hits
      • SearchHelper.historyContext (ignored if null)
      • SearchHelper.sourceContext (ignored if null)
      • SearchHelper.summarizer (if sourceContext is not null)
      • SearchHelper.sourceRoot (if sourceContext or historyContext is not null)
      Parameters:
      out - write destination
      sh - search helper which has all required fields set
      start - index of the first hit to print
      end - index of the last hit to print
      Throws:
      HistoryException - history exception
      IOException - I/O exception
      ClassNotFoundException - class not found
